ctime.name: Creation time
ctime.description: Creation time of the data (for simulation it coincide with the runtime)
ctime.values: A floating-point number representing the creation time of the data as the time elapsed since January 1, 2000, in years

formula.name: Formula
formula.values: String of the chemical formula of the system

pbc.name: PBC
pbc.values: List with boolean value for each dimension where PBC is applied (e.g. [True, False, True] means PBC is applied in x-direction, y-direction and z-direction)

user.name: Username
user.description: Username or full name of the user who created the data

calculator.name: Calculator
calculator.values: Name of the ASE-calculator and engine used to calculate the system (e.g `ams/band` means AMS calcumatlor with BAND engine)

energy.name: Energy
energy.description: Total energy of the system from the calculation
energy.values: A floating point number representing the total energy in eV

natoms.name: Number of atoms
natoms.values: A integer number representing the number of atoms

fmax.name: Maximum force
fmax.values: A floating point number representing the maximum force module in eV/Å

smax.name: Maximum stress
smax.values: A floating point number representing the maximum stress module in eV/Å³

charge.name: Charge
charge.values: A floating point number representing the net charge in the unit cell

mass.name: Mass
mass.description: Sum of atomic masses in unit cell
mass.values: A floating point number representing the sum of atomic masses in the unit cell in atomic units

magmom.name: Magnetic moment
magmom.values: A floating point number representing the magnetic moment (for this LiF  dataset it is always empty)

unique_id.name: Unique ID
unique_id.values: A integer number representing the random (unique) ID

volume.name: Volume
volume.values: A floating point number representing the volume of the unit cell in Å³

functional.name: XC Fuctional
functional.values: String of the XC functional used in the calculation, the single XC functional is written in the format `[XC Type]/[XC Name]` (e.g. `GGA/PBE`), if multiple functional was used they are separated by a comma (e.g. `GGA/PBE,LDA/VWN,MetaGGA/TPSS`)

fermi_energy.name: Fermi Energy
fermi_energy.description: Fermi Energy (N.B. is not the Fermi Level), which indicates the energy of non-interacting fermions in the system (Fermi gas) at 0 K
fermi_energy.values: A floating point number representing the Fermi Energy in eV

homo_energy.name: HOMO energy
homo_energy.values: A floating point number representing the HOMO energy in eV

lumo_energy.name: LUMO energy
lumo_energy.values: A floating point number representing the LUMO energy in eV

band_gap.name: Band gap energy
band_gap.description: Band gap energy (for LiF is the HOMO energy - LUMO energy)
band_gap.values: A floating point number representing the band gap energy in eV

runtime.name: Run Time
runtime.values: A string representing the start date of the simulation whit format `%b%d-%Y %H:%M:%S` (e.g. 04May-2023 08:10:22)

elapsed.name: Elapsed Time
elapsed.values: A integer representing the total simulation time in seconds

name.name: System Name
name.values: A sting used as name of the system

sim_name.name: Simulation Name
sim_name.values: A sting used as name of the simulation

subset_name.name: Subset Name
subset_name.description: Name of the subset of configuration

values.ab-initio md 300K: Frames from 300K ab initio MD of LiF
values.ab-initio md 500K: Frames from 300K ab initio MD of LiF
values.ab-initio md amorphous crystal: Frames from 2700K ab initio MD of LiF
values.interstitial defects: System where N atomos of Li wass add in the interstitial sites
values.pure elements unit cell: Pure Li or F unit cell
values.slabs: Slabs of {100}, {110}, {111}, {121} cristal plane with differnts thickness
values.strained lattice: Systems where the differnt strain (ε_xx, ε_xy, ε_xx + ε_yy + ε_zz) and differnt value of strain was applied
values.substitutional defects: Systems where Li of F atoms are randomly substitut
values.unit cell: Simulation of unitecel from Material Project
values.vacancy defects: System where crystal Li atoms are randomly removed

run_script.name: Run Script
run_script.description: Full AMS scrip for running the simulation
run_script.values: Full script stored as a string

input_script.name: Input Script
input_script.description: Full input scrip for running the simulation
input_script.values: Full script stored as a string

values.False: The simulation end with errors or never started

used_in.name: Used in
used_in.description: Indicate in which set the data was used

values.training: Data used in the training set
values.test: Data used in the test set

values.single point: Single Pointe (energy and forces from SCF)

space_group.name: Space Group Symbols
space_group.description: Full International Space Group Symbol. The notation is a LaTeX-like string, with screw axes being represented by an underscore.
space_group.values: The space group notation in a LaTeX-like string, with screw axes being represented by an underscore. (see pymatgen.symmetry.groups.SpaceGroup (https://pymatgen.org/pymatgen.symmetry.groups.html#pymatgen.symmetry.groups.SpaceGroup))

DOS.name: DOS
DOS.description: Density of states as `dictionary` with both the energy and frequency of the histogram

Energy [eV].description: Center value of the energy intervals (bins) usude for the calculation of the DOS
Energy [eV].values: An numpy array with floating-point values of the energy

Total DOS [1/eV].description: Density of state for each bin
Total DOS [1/eV].values: An numpy array with floating-point values of the density of states

History.name: History
History.description: Simulation history containing the scalar quantities evolution during the simulation, i.e. total energy, max force, force RMS, max step, step RMS and max stress per atom

Energy [eV].values: An numpy array with floating-point of the evolution of the energy during the simulation

Max force [eV/A].values: An numpy array with floating-point of the evolution of the maximum force norme during the simulation

RMS force [eV/A].description: Root Mean Squere of the forces
RMS force [eV/A].values: An numpy array with floating-point of the evolution of the RMS of the forces during the simulation

Max step [A].values: An numpy array with floating-point of the evolution of the maximum atom dispacement during the simulation

RMS step [A].description: Root Mean Squere of the atoms dispacement
RMS step [A].values: An numpy array with floating-point of the evolution of the RMS of the atoms dispacement during the simulation

Max stress per atom [eV/A^3].values: An numpy array with floating-point of the evolution of the maximum  stress per atoms during the simulation
